title: India Ratings for Indian debt instruments – Oct 7
text:
India Ratings for Indian debt instruments – Oct 7

Stock Markets 18 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 14:50)

© Reuters. India Ratings for Indian debt instruments – Oct 7 Oct 7 (Reuters) - Below are the ratings awarded by India Ratings and Research Private Ltd (India Ratings), formerly known as Fitch Ratings India for local debt instruments as of October 4, 2019. COMPANY INSTRUMENT RATING AMOUNT MOVEMENT (RS.MLN) ------ ---------- ------ ------ --------- SHORT TERM RATINGS: ------------------- C Mohanlal Pvt Ltd Non-FB limits IND A3 Affirmed Gallantt Metal Ltd Non FB limits IND A1 Affirmed K B A Infrastructure Pvt Ltd Non-FB Fac IND A4 Affirmed (reduced from INR61.146) Majestic Exports Non-FB WC limits IND A4+ Affirmed Mil Industries Ltd Non-FB Fac IND A4+ Affirmed P. Lakshmi Non-FB limits IND A4+ - (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Plastene India Ltd Non-FB WC limits IND A3+ Upgraded Plastene India Ltd Forward contract limitsIND A3+ Upgraded LONG TERM RATINGS: ------------------- Acebright (I) Pharma Pvt Ltd IND BBB-/Positive206.16 Assigned Big Sky Properties Pvt Ltd IND BBB 343.5 - (Migrated to non-cooperating category) C Mohanlal Pvt Ltd IND BBB-/Stable 218 Affirmed (increased from INR248.7) C Mohanlal Pvt Ltd FB limits IND BBB-/Stable 150 Affirmed C Mohanlal Pvt Ltd IND BBB-/Stable 27 Assigned *The final rating has been assigned following the receipt of executed financing documents by Ind-Ra. Dbl Yavatmal Wardha Highways Performance BG (PBG)* - 521.7 Withdrawn Pvt Ltd (limits cancelled) *The PBG was released by the Concession Authority on completion of 30% construction works (physical progress) in accordance with the concession agreement signed between DYWHPL and the Concession Authority. The PBG limits were subsequently cancelled by the lenders and there is no amount outstanding against this facility as on date. Dbl Yavatmal Wardha Highways Rupee TL IND A+/ Stable 3082.5 Upgraded Pvt Ltd Enn Enn Corp Ltd TL limits IND BBB 1083.8 - (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Enn Enn Corp Ltd FB WC limits IND BBB/IND A3+ 100 - (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Gallantt Metal Ltd FB limits IND A/Stable/IND 500 Affirmed A1 Gateway Distriparks Ltd IND AA-/Stable 0.84 Affirmed (reduced from INR1.1) Gateway Distriparks Ltd IND AA-/Stable 5.5 Affirmed Gateway Distriparks Ltd Non-FB limits IND AA-/Stable/ 0.75 Affirmed IND A1+ Gateway Distriparks Ltd FB limits Affirmed AA-/Stable/IND A1+ Gateway Rail Freight Ltd FB limits IND AA-/ Stable/ 400 Affirmed IND A1+ Gateway Rail Freight Ltd Non-FB limits IND AA-/ Stable/ 950 Affirmed IND A1+ Gateway Rail Freight Ltd IND AA-/Stable 1440 Affirmed Hemali Investment & Finance Pvt TL IND BB+ - Ltd (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Indian Oil (NS: ) Corporation Ltd NCDs* IND AAA/Stable 30000 Assigned * Yet to be issued. The issue size will be INR10 billion, with an option to retain additional INR20 billion. K B A Infrastructure Pvt Ltd FB Fac Affirmed B+/Stable/IND A4 (reduced from INR100) Lords Mark Industries Pvt Ltd TL* Maintained in cooperating category and withdrawn *Maintained at ‘IND BB+(ISSUER NOT COOPERATING)' before being withdrawn Lords Mark Industries Pvt Ltd FB WC Fac** Maintained in cooperating category and withdrawn **Maintained at ‘IND BB+(ISSUER NOT COPPERATING)/IND A4+(ISSUER NOT COOPERATING)' before being withdrawn. Lrehl Renewables India Spv 1 IND A/Stable 2112.4 Affirmed Pvt Ltd M/S.Dhuni Polymers Pvt Ltd IND BBB-/Stable 237.5 Affirmed M/S.Dhuni Polymers Pvt Ltd WC limit Affirmed BBB-/Stable/IND A3 Majestic Exports IND BB+/Stable 39.3 Upgraded Majestic Exports FB WC limits Long-term BB+/Stable/IND upgraded, Short-term affirmed Mil Industries Ltd FB Fac IND BB+/Stable 22 Affirmed Mileage Real Estates Pvt Ltd IND BBB 359.2 - (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Mindchampion Learning Systems FB limits* Affirmed and Ltd Withdrawn *Affirmed at ‘IND AA-'/Stable/‘IND A1+' before being withdrawn Mindchampion Learning Systems Non-FB limits* Affirmed and Ltd Withdrawn *Affirmed at ‘IND AA-'/Stable/‘IND A1+' before being withdrawn P. Lakshmi FB limits IND BB- /IND A4+ 130 - (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Plastene India Ltd Long-TL IND BBB/ Stable 354.3 Upgraded Plastene India Ltd FB WC limits IND BBB/ Stable 1610 Upgraded Plastene India Ltd Corporate loans IND BBB/ Stable 350 Upgraded Polygon Properties Pvt Ltd IND BBB 267.9 - (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Shri Ramswaroop Memorial 466.3 - Charitable Trust (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Shri Ramswaroop Memorial FB WC Fac* - Charitable Trust (Migrated to non-cooperating category) Tamil Nadu (NS: ) Transmission Bond INE084G09222 IND A(CE)/ Stable1890 Affirmed Corporation Ltd Tamil Nadu Transmission Bond INE084G09230 IND A(CE)/ Stable800 Affirmed Corporation Ltd Tamil Nadu Transmission Bond INE084G09248 IND A(CE)/ Stable1270 Affirmed Corporation Ltd Tamil Nadu Transmission Unsupported rating$ IND BBB/Stable - Assigned Corporation Ltd $Ind-Ra has assigned unsupported rating in compliance with the Securities Exchange Board of India's circular dated 13 June ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Note:- All Indian National-scale ratings previously assigned by Fitch have been transferred to India Ratings & Research Private Ltd (India Ratings), which is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Fitch Group. The withdrawn criteria are now available on India Ratings' website at www.indiaratings.co.in $: Rating watch with positive implication #: Rating Watch with Developing implications @: Rating Watch with Negative Implications %: Rating under Credit Watch wd -Rating Stands Withdrawn sp -Rating Suspended pp -Principal Protected pn -Principal Not Protected INDIA RATINGS may apply + or - signs for ratings to reflect a comparative standing within the category. BG-Bank Guarantee; CC-Cash Credit; CCPS-Cumulative Convertible Preference Share; CD-Certificate of Deposit; CLO-Collateralized Loan Obligation; CPA-Claims Paying Ability; CP-Commercial Paper; CPS-convertible preference shares; CRPS- Cumulative Redeemable Convertible Preference shares; DDB-Deep Discount Bond; EPBI-Exchange premium bond; FBL-Fund Based Limits; FRB/FRN -Floating Rate Bond/Note; ICD -Inter Corporate Deposit; ITD-Immediate Term Debt; LOC-Letter of Credit; LT -Long Term; LTB -Long Term Borrowing; LTD -Long Term Debt; MOCD-multiple option convertible debenture; MTD -Medium term Debenture; MTN-medium term notes; NCD(SO) - Non-Convertible Debenture-(Structured Obligation); NCD-Non-convertible Debentures; NCRB-Non Convertible Redeemable Bonds; NM-Not Meaningful; OCD-optionally convertible debenture; OD-Over Draft; OFCD-Optionally Fully Convertible Debenture; PCD-Partially Convertible Debenture; PCN-partly convertible notes; PCPS-Partly Convertible Preference Share; POCD-partly optional; PP-privately placed; PSPC-Post Shipment & Packing Credit; PS-Preference Shares; PTC-Pass Through Certificates; RPS-Redeemable Preference Shares; SCPN-secured convertible preference notes; SDO-Structured Debt Obligation; SLR-Statutory Liquidity Ratio; SO-Structured Obligation; SPCD - Secured Partly Convertible Debentures; SPN-secured premium notes; STB-Short Term Bond; STD-Short Term Debentures; ST-Short Term; Sub. Bonds-Subordinate Bonds; TB-Taxable Bond; TFB-Tax Free Bond; TL-Term Loan; TOCD-triple option convertible debentures; RWN- Rating Watch Negative; RWN- Rating Watch Evolve.
